paragraphs.name: 29b6
paragraphs.text: I appreciate the opportunity to present all available evidence regarding Senator Mitch McConnell and I think that we can now state conclusively that he has no teeth, no spine, no guts, and no nuts.

paragraphs.name: be1e
paragraphs.text: First, there is ample evidence, particularly of late, that Mitch McConnell is somehow able to stand and walk despite the lack of a backbone. While spineless Republican politicians have never been in short supply in Washington, they seem to be everywhere after this most recent presidential election.

paragraphs.name: 7dfb
paragraphs.text: I’m reposting this on my Facebook page, if you allow me to do that. My friends need to be entertained, too, in these dark days.

354c8a4ffe1c.title: This is the funniest story of them all!

paragraphs.text: This is the funniest story of them all! The pictures make this one laugh out loud 😭 hysterical…and, I would feel bad about you putting toothless, spineless Mitch on blast if he weren’t such a reprehensible snake! But he is! So let the satire roll!
paragraphs.name: 928b

b2ed9bb1dda1.title: So Allan, you’ve presented overwhelming evidence that the Mitchster has no toofies.

paragraphs.text: So Allan, you’ve presented overwhelming evidence that the Mitchster has no toofies. As for the other things missing in his life i.e. spine, testicles and stomach I say no, a resounding no and no again!! As usual you’ve nailed it!! Thank you from your adoring fans!!
paragraphs.name: 8ccf

76da13959326.title: He secretly founded and chairs the Gingivitis Caucus and they’re fighting to get dental care cut…

paragraphs.text: He secretly founded and chairs the Gingivitis Caucus and they’re fighting to get dental care cut from the now dead healthcare bill.
paragraphs.name: c78b

b1eb688217d0.title: Ok, I know this was satire about McConnell not having teeth but seriously, I’ve actually wondered…

paragraphs.text: Ok, I know this was satire about McConnell not having teeth but seriously, I’ve actually wondered IF he does?! That said, he doesn’t have the cajones to be Senate Majority leader. Maybe Andrew Zimmern can invite Mitch along and together they can eat Rocky Mountain Oysters… at least he’d know what it’s like to have a set of balls? Or is that eat a set…

paragraphs.text: I never figured out what lilys and liver have to do with each other. I’ve also never heard of ‘nuzzling’, but the image still has me cracking up. Thanks for the daily giggle. Going back to sleep now…
paragraphs.name: 80b0

7317cced83a0.title: I have a minor toothache, but Mitch has no teeth.

paragraphs.text: I have a minor toothache, but Mitch has no teeth.

If I bring him up there with me, and I’m serious about this Allan, you have to explain to him that no one wants him whipping out his dentures so he can sooth his swollen gums on a creamy mint chip Carp’s cone.
Promise me.
–AI

285b75a03a0f.name: Allan Wing
